member.name: T:Unosquare.PassCore.PasswordProvider.PasswordChangeOptions
member.summary: Represents the options of this provider.

member.name: P:Unosquare.PassCore.PasswordProvider.PasswordChangeOptions.UseAutomaticContext
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [use automatic context].
member.value: true if [use automatic context]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Unosquare.PassCore.PasswordProvider.PasswordChangeOptions.RestrictedADGroups
member.summary: Gets or sets the restricted ad groups.

member.name: P:Unosquare.PassCore.PasswordProvider.PasswordChangeOptions.AllowedADGroups
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed ad groups.

member.name: P:Unosquare.PassCore.PasswordProvider.PasswordChangeOptions.IdTypeForUser
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier type for user.

member.name: P:Unosquare.PassCore.PasswordProvider.PasswordChangeOptions.UpdateLastPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [update last password].
member.value: true if [update last password]; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Unosquare.PassCore.PasswordProvider.PasswordChangeProvider
member.summary: Default Change Password Provider using 'System.DirectoryServices' from Microsoft.
This code is taken from the answer https://stackoverflow.com/a/1766203 from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1394025/active-directory-ldap-check-account-locked-out-password-expired.

member.name: M:Unosquare.PassCore.PasswordProvider.PasswordChangeProvider.SetIdType
member.summary: Use the values from appsettings.IdTypeForUser as fault-tolerant as possible.
